Free Yourself
From Nonsense

A responsive, mobile-first theme with everything you need, and nothing you don’t

Make It Yours

Everything is built with SASS. Want different colors? Different fonts? Larger or smaller padding? It’s all just a variable away.

Vanilla JS

Imbue doesn’t depend on any fancy-schmancy JavaScript libraries. But if you want to include jQuery or React, I won’t tell anyone.

Skip the Bloat

We’re grownups, right? We don’t need a lucrative page builder, or a million Google Fonts preloaded. We can handle that stuff by ourselves.

Vanilla JS

Skip the Bloat

We’re grownups, right? We don’t need a lucrative page builder, or a million Google Fonts preloaded. We can handle that stuff by ourselves.

Imbue exists to save you time, not to hold your hand

We’ve all seen them. The big themes, the top sellers, the ones that promise you a bucket full of rainbows, the ones that are supposedly so easy to use, even your grandma could do it. 500 HTML files! 600 PSD templates! A page builder capable of turning anyone into a web design genius! A whole smorgasboard of bloated, slapped-together jQuery plugins for every conceivable occasion!

And what happens once the hype runs out? The site runs like a potato. All the precious seconds you spend staring at that slick loading spinner give you time to think about how bigger isn’t always better. So what’s the solution? What kind of theme do you use when you want a head start without including everything but the kitchen sink?

Enter Imbue: a no-nonsense theme for people who don’t like their hand to be held, because eww, cooties.

Imbue doesn’t have any plugins. It’s just good old-fashioned HTML, CSS, and a touch of JavaScript. It doesn’t rely on anything, but it will trust everything. You can adapt it to work on a platform such as WordPress or Drupal, or you can just use it for a static site. It doesn’t care how you use it and neither do I.

That’s what Imbue is about - letting people who aren’t totally helpless make their own decisions. It’s designed to—wait for it—imbue you with a sense of freedom and self-reliance.
